Headline: #54 Cicero Temporary Reroute at Cicero/31st
ShortDescription: 54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, 16th, Laramie, Cermak, and Cicero due to street blockage near Cicero/31st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Cicero, 16th, Laramie, Cermak, and Cicero due to street blockage near Cicero/31st.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #21 Cermak Temporary Reroute at Cicero/21st
ShortDescription: 21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted via Cermak, Laramie, 16th, Cicero, and Cermak due to street blockage near Cicero/21st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Cermak, Laramie, 16th, Cicero, and Cermak, due to street blockage near Cicero/21st.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #119 Michigan/119th Temporary Reroute near 119th/Marshfield
ShortDescription: 119 Michigan/119th buses temp. rerouted EB: 119th, Vincennes, 115th, Marshfield, and 119th; WB: 119th, Ashland, 115th, vincennes, and 119th nr 119th/Marshfield.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#119 Michigan/119th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near 119th/Marshfield.

Eastbound buses will operate via 119th, Vincennes, 115th, Marshfield, and 119th.

Westbound buses will operate via 119th, Ashland, 115th, vincennes, and 119th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following an earlier mechanical problem at Montrose. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following an earlier mechanical problem at Montrose.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No Trains Between Damen and Western (Forest Park Branch)
ShortDescription: Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended between Damen and Western (FP Branch) due to police activty.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended between Damen and Western (FP Branch) due to police activty.

As a result, trains are operating in two sections:

  • between O'Hare and Damen, and,
  • between Western (Forest Park Branch) and Forest Park, only.

Shuttle buses have been requested to provide connecting service through the affected area. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
